sn37.12:1.1: “Pañcahi, anuruddha, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo …pe… nirayaṃ upapajjati.
sn37.12:1.3: Assaddho ca hoti, ahiriko ca hoti, anottappī ca hoti, kusīto ca hoti, duppañño ca hoti—
sn37.12:1.4: imehi kho, anuruddha, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo …pe… apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatī”ti.
